introduction: This video discusses the difference between theory and practice in deep learning. The speaker argues that most research in the field focuses on minor advances with little practical impact, while transfer learning and active learning are understudied and have the potential to revolutionize the field.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to Deep Learning
content: Explanation of deep learning and its applications.
Discussion on the importance of transfer learning and active learning in deep learning.
Mention of the speaker's experience with transfer learning in NLP.
Overview of the sections to follow.

sections.title: Section 2: The Problem with Scientific Research in Deep Learning
content: Explanation of the pressure on scientists to publish research that is familiar to their peers.
Discussion on the lack of practical applications in deep learning research.
Examples of minor advances in deep learning that have little practical impact.
The speaker's personal experience with writing a paper on transfer learning in NLP.

sections.title: Section 3: Transfer Learning in Deep Learning
content: Introduction to transfer learning and its importance in deep learning.
Examples of successful transfer learning in deep learning.
Discussion on the challenges and limitations of transfer learning.
The speaker's experience with implementing transfer learning in NLP.

sections.title: Section 4: Active Learning in Deep Learning
content: Explanation of active learning and its potential in deep learning.
Examples of successful active learning in deep learning.
Discussion on the challenges and limitations of active learning.
The speaker's experience with implementing active learning in practice.

sections.title: Section 5: Conclusion and Future Directions
content: Recap of the key points discussed in the video.
Discussion on the potential of transfer learning and active learning in deep learning.
Call to action for researchers to focus on practical applications in deep learning.
Final thoughts and closing remarks.
